name: It's Raining Somewhere Else
description:
It's raining somewhere in the world... But where? 

Hints: 

  • To win, you have to find out a location that has *exact same condition* and *similar temperature* as the question requested. There are multiple possible answers to a single question. 
  • An orange marker indicates that this location has either *condition* or *temperature* correct. 
  • Helpful website(s):
    • Day and Night World Map
    • An explaination of 'wind direction in degrees'

Updates:

  • 2022-09-04T16:50:07.371Z: Fixed the issue of the game ending before depleting all 15 guesses.
  • 2022-09-04T18:14:05.607Z: Add map type selection.
  • 2022-09-04T18:19:53.781Z: Add mobile support.
  • 2022-09-04T20:12:28.660Z: Fix numerous styling issues.

Github repo: https://github.com/wlyh514/its-raining-somewhere-else

References:

  • https://github.com/googlemaps/js-samples/blob/ba83e1f1f8ecfb6f4e89a1dc1a552a4cb3...
  • https://stackoverflow.com/a/23163930/15405467
  • Many npm packages, see package.json and /client/package.json
